languages.text: Офицеры одной из нижних палуб перестали докладывать о состоянии судна и экипажа. Уже третий день вместо ответов из вокс-системы доносятся приглушенные стоны и влажные хлопки. Отправленный для выяснения обстоятельств отряд сообщил, что обитатели нижних уровней превратились в животных, презревших приличия, после чего с отрядом утратили связь. Верховный Проповедник Миссии Экклезиархии, побагровев, заявил, что это козни Архиврага. Молитвами и огнем гнездо ереси было очищено.

traits.locale_text: Офицеры одной из нижних палуб перестали докладывать о состоянии судна и экипажа. Уже третий день вместо ответов из вокс-системы доносятся приглушенные стоны и влажные хлопки. Отправленный для выяснения обстоятельств отряд сообщил, что обитатели нижних уровней превратились в животных, презревших приличия, после чего с отрядом утратили связь. Верховный Проповедник Миссии Экклезиархии, побагровев, заявил, что это козни Архиврага. Молитвами и огнем гнездо ереси было очищено.

languages.text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.
languages.original_text: Офицеры одной из нижних палуб перестали докладывать о состоянии судна и экипажа. Уже третий день вместо ответов из вокс-системы доносятся приглушенные стоны и влажные хлопки. Отправленный для выяснения обстоятельств отряд сообщил, что обитатели нижних уровней превратились в животных, презревших приличия, после чего с отрядом утратили связь. Верховный Проповедник Миссии Экклезиархии, побагровев, заявил, что это козни Архиврага. Молитвами и огнем гнездо ереси было очищено.

traits.locale_text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped reporting on the status of the vessel and its crew. It has been three days since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity before the connection was lost for good. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum turned red in the face and condemned these designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

The officers on one of the lower decks stopped reporting on the status of the vessel and its crew. It has been three days since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity before the connection was lost for good. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum turned red in the face and condemned these designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

languages.text: 某片下层甲板的军官突然不再提供甲板状态报告。三天过去了，除了低沉的呻吟声和潮湿的啪嗒声，音阵系统再没有收到其他声音。负责调查此事的执法者小组报告说，这片下层甲板的居民已经堕落为了野兽，而在不久之后，就连这支小组也失去了联系。国教教会的高级传教士为此勃然大怒，谴责这些现象都是混沌大敌的阴谋。到了最后，那片异端的温床在火焰与祈祷之中得到了净化。
languages.original_text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

traits.locale_text: 某片下层甲板的军官突然不再提供甲板状态报告。三天过去了，除了低沉的呻吟声和潮湿的啪嗒声，音阵系统再没有收到其他声音。负责调查此事的镇压者小组报告说，这片下层甲板的居民已经堕落为了野兽，而在不久之后，就连这支小组也失去了联系。国教教会的高级传教士为此勃然大怒，谴责这些现象都是混沌大敌的阴谋。到了最后，那片异端的温床在火焰与祈祷之中得到了净化。

languages.text: Los oficiales de una de las cubiertas inferiores dejaron de informar. Hacía tres días que el sistema voco no emitía más que tenues gemidos y húmedos bofetones. Una brigada enviada a investigar informó de que los habitantes de los niveles inferiores se habían convertido en animales y habían sucumbido a la depravación. La conexión con el escuadrón se perdió al poco rato. El Alto Misionero del Adeptus Ministorum se llenó de furia y los condenó como designios del Archienemigo. El caldo de cultivo de la herejía se limpió a base de fuego y oraciones.
languages.original_text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales de una de las cubiertas inferiores dejaron de informar. Hacía tres días que el sistema voco no emitía más que tenues gemidos y húmedos bofetones. Una brigada enviada a investigar informó de que los habitantes de los niveles inferiores se habían convertido en animales y habían sucumbido a la depravación. La conexión con el escuadrón se perdió al poco rato. El Alto Misionero del Adeptus Ministorum se llenó de furia y los condenó como designios del Archienemigo. El caldo de cultivo de la herejía se limpió a base de fuego y oraciones.

languages.text: とある下位デッキの士官から届く状況報告が滞っている。ヴォクスシステムから、抑え気味のうめき声と濡れたようなパシパシという音だけが聞こえて3日が経った。調査に派遣された執行官部隊の報告では、下層に住む民が動物へと退行して、腐敗に屈したという。部隊との接続はまもなく失われた。帝国宗務局の上位聖務団は憤慨して、これは渾沌の勢力の策略だと激しく主張した。異端の温床は炎と祈りで浄化された。
languages.original_text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

traits.locale_text: とある下位デッキの士官から届く状況報告が滞っている。ヴォクスシステムから、抑え気味のうめき声と濡れたようなパシパシという音だけが聞こえて3日が経った。調査に派遣された執行官部隊の報告では、下層に住む民が動物へと退行して、腐敗に屈したという。部隊との接続はまもなく失われた。帝国宗務局の上位聖務団は憤慨して、これは渾沌の勢力の策略だと激しく主張した。異端の温床は炎と祈りで浄化された。

languages.text: Les officiers de l'un des ponts inférieurs ont cessé d'envoyer leurs rapports de situation, et cela fait trois jours que le système-vox émet des gémissements étouffés et des claquements. Un groupe de prévôts envoyé pour enquêter signale que les résidents des niveaux inférieurs sont revenus à l'état sauvage et vivent désormais dans la débauche la plus totale, mais la communication est rapidement interrompue. Le Haut Missionnaire de l'Adeptus Ministorum est fou de rage et impute ce phénomène aux plans machiavéliques du Grand Ennemi. Le foyer de l'hérésie est immédiatement purgé par le feu et la prière.
languages.original_text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

traits.locale_text: Les officiers de l'un des ponts inférieurs ont cessé d'envoyer leurs rapports de situation, et cela fait trois jours que le système-vox émet des gémissements étouffés et des claquements. Un groupe de prévôts envoyé pour enquêter signale que les résidents des niveaux inférieurs sont revenus à l'état sauvage et vivent désormais dans la débauche la plus totale, mais la communication est rapidement interrompue. Le Haut Missionnaire de l'Adeptus Ministorum est fou de rage et impute ce phénomène aux plans machiavéliques du Grand Ennemi. Le foyer de l'hérésie est immédiatement purgé par le feu et la prière.

languages.text: Die Offiziere auf einem der Unterdecks haben jedoch plötzlich keine Statusberichte mehr geschickt. Seit drei Tagen hatte das Voxsystem nur noch leises Stöhnen und nasse, klatschende Geräusche übertragen. Es wurde ein Enforcer-Trupp losgeschickt, um nach dem Rechten zu sehen. Er berichtete, dass die Bewohner der unteren Decks sich zu Tieren zurückentwickelt hatten und sich vollkommen verderbt benahmen. Bald darauf ging der Kontakt zu dem Trupp verloren. Der Hohe Missionar des Adeptus Ministorum wurde rot vor Zorn und verurteilte das Geschehen als Werk des Erzfeinds. Der Sündenpfuhl und alle Ketzer darin wurden durch Feuer und Gebete geläutert.

An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.

traits.locale_text: Die Offiziere auf einem der Unterdecks haben jedoch plötzlich keine Statusberichte mehr geschickt. Seit drei Tagen hatte das Voxsystem nur noch leises Stöhnen und nasse, klatschende Geräusche übertragen. Es wurde ein Enforcer-Trupp losgeschickt, um nach dem Rechten zu sehen. Er berichtete, dass die Bewohner der unteren Decks sich zu Tieren zurückentwickelt hatten und sich vollkommen verderbt benahmen. Bald darauf ging der Kontakt zu dem Trupp verloren. Der Hohe Missionar des Adeptus Ministorum wurde rot vor Zorn und verurteilte das Geschehen als Werk des Erzfeinds. Der Sündenpfuhl und alle Ketzer darin wurden durch Feuer und Gebete geläutert.

languages.text: Alt güvertelerden birindeki subaylar, durum raporlarını iletmeyi kesti. Voks sisteminden yalnızca boğuk iniltiler ve ıslak çarpma sesleri duyulmasının üzerinden üç gün geçti. Durumu araştırmak için gönderilen bir infazcı mangası, alt seviyelerdeki sakinlerin hayvanlığa gerilediğini ve yozlaşmaya teslim olduğunu bildirdi. Kısa süre sonra manga ile bağlantı kesildi. Adeptus Ministorum Arşımisyoneri, öfkeden küplere bindi ve bunun Şerbaşı'nın bir oyunu olduğunu ilan etti. Kâfirlik yuvası, ateşle ve dualarla temizlendi.
languages.original_text: The officers on one of the lower decks stopped providing status reports. Three days had passed since the vox-system broadcasted anything other than subdued moans and wet slapping noises. An enforcer squad sent to investigate reported that the denizens of the lower levels had regressed to animals and succumbed to depravity. The connection with the squad was shortly lost. The High Missionary of the Adeptus Ministorum became flush with fury and condemned these as designs of the Archenemy. The hotbed of heresy was cleansed with fire and prayer.
